EmailTemplate.name: MIPIM 2014 Final Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Come and see us at MIPIM
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
11-14 March Palais des Festivals, Cannes, France
Level 01 Stand: 18.02
Our teams from London, Manchester, Leeds, Moscow and Istanbul are ready to meet you at MIPIM at our AECOM stand.
Each day we will be hosting a champagne reception at our stand at 4pm â€“ join us if you can.
Please contact any member of the team directly if you would like to arrange to meet during MIPIM.
